name: Brandi Clark Burton
seeking: Seeking eco-conscious brands, sustainable product companies, or corporate sustainability initiatives to partner with Environmentality Inc on content or campaigns. JV partners in the green business, ESG consulting, or environmental education space would align with the mission-driven brand. Could also collaborate with consumer brands seeking credibility through environmental storytelling or sustainability certification partners.
who_you_serve: Environmentally-conscious consumers and businesses seeking sustainable products and eco-friendly solutions.
what_you_do: Produces environmental sustainability content and initiatives through Environmentality Inc.
business_focus: Produces environmental sustainability content and initiatives through Environmentality Inc.
